summary: After wrecking their house during a chase, Tom and Jerry enter a race around the world where the winner gets a new fancy house.
cast: Charlie Adler|Jeff Bennett|John DiMaggio|Jess Harnell|Tom Kenny|Bill Kopp|Tress MacNeille|Rob Paulsen|Billy West|J. Grant Albrecht|Thom Pinto|Neil Ross|Renna Nightingale
keywords: bear|race car|hyperbolic jaw drop|fight cloud|tongue stuck on a pole
title: Tom y Jerry en la super carrera
